Description_lang: Alcruux afflicts the nearest player with the essence of hunger for $d, allowing them to safely absorb volatile anima but inflicting $350013s1 Shadow damage every $350013t1 sec to all other players within $s4 yards.Upon expiration, $@spellname349627 is transfered to the nearest other player.
AuraDescription_lang: $350013s1 Shadow damage inflicted to nearby allies every $350013t1 sec. Upon expiration transfers to nearest ally.
